snippet: The Mexican Navy announced Monday that a suspected member of a drug gang was captured while carrying the identification cards of a recently slain newspaper employee in the state of Veracruz.
lead_paragraph: The Mexican Navy announced Monday that a suspected member of a drug gang was captured while carrying the identification cards of a recently slain newspaper employee in the state of Veracruz.

headline.seo: Suspected Drug Gang Member Linked to Veracruz Killings
headline.main: Mexico: Suspect Linked to Veracruz Killings, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Suspect Linked to Veracruz Killings, Officials Say
